page.title: 16ALEXANDER MORTON - SAWMILL
page.content: In Rumblingwell,near our school there is a sawmill which is one hundred and fifty years old.It employs fifty three people. The sawmill was modernised with new buildings and machinery about twenty-five years ago.A guard dog has recently been acquired to prevent theft. Different kinds of wood are used-Hardwood such as Mahogany and Ash and Softwood such as Spruce and Redwoods. The woods come from many different countries-Finland,Sweden and Canada. Alexander Morton sells wood to both manufacturers and the general public but do not make anything from the wood they buy and sell.The wood is cut into various sizes depending on the customers' needs.Their busiest time of year is Spring/Summer.
